en.name: Speed Spell – Clear Mind R
en.effect:
Can be used by removing Speed Counters. Effects vary depending on how many Speed Counters you remove.Remove 2
Until the end of the turn, all monsters you control will inflict piercing battle damage when attacking a monster in Defense Position.Remove 4
Play 1 Tuner Monster from your Deck or hand.Remove 6
Play 1 Level 2 or lower Synchro Monster in Defense Position from your Extra Deck.Remove 8
The ATK of Synchro Monsters you control is multiplied by 5 until the end of the turn.
